short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get translation and context-aware explanation from any text on web using OpenAI API key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Translate & Explain any text from a web page using AI. Just select the text you want to translate, and click on "Translate with AI". You can optionally click "Explain" from the translation popup to get a longer explanation.

Key features:
• Translate text to 40+ languages
• Get helpful explanations of complex content
• Clean, floating popup that stays out of your way
• Easy drag-and-drop positioning
• Works on any website
• No tracking or payments. Use your own OpenAI API key.

Perfect for:
• Reading foreign language websites
• Understanding content with context
• Learning new languages
• Studying international content
• Quick translations while browsing

Simple to use: Just select text, and click "Translate with AI". The translation appears instantly in a clean popup. Move it anywhere on your screen, and copy translations with one click.

You need an OpenAI API key to work with this extension. You can generate one from OpenAI's website - https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
